title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 4, pt. 385 - Public Assistance And Food Stamp Employment Program Requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 4, pt. 385 - Public Assistance And Food Stamp Employment Program Requirements

State Regulations
§ 385.0 - Scope
§ 385.2 - Participation and exemptions for applicants and for recipients of public assistance
§ 385.3 - Work registration, registration exemptions, and certain eligibility requirements for SNAP applicants and recipients
§ 385.4 - Supportive services
§ 385.5 - Orientation requirements
§ 385.6 - Assessments and employability plans for households with dependent children
§ 385.7 - Assessments and employability plans for households without dependent children
§ 385.8 - Participation rate requirements
§ 385.9 - Work activities and work requirements
§ 385.10 - Local district employment plans
§ 385.11 - Conciliation
§ 385.12 - Process of eligibility determination
§ 385.13 - Voluntary termination of employment and voluntary reduction of earning capacity (voluntary quit)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 4, pt. 385

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, art. 5, title
9-B, §§ 20[3][d], 34[3][f]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
